title: Local Loop Map Schema
description: A test schema to add businesses to the Murmurations Index for Local Loop

name.title: Business Name
name.description: The full name of the business

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.description: The familiar name of the business

tags.title: Tags/Type
tags.description: Use these for the business sector SIC code so the map can be filtered

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the business

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the business

full_address.title: Full Address
full_address.description: The complete address of the business in a single text field as you would write it on an envelope, including the street address, city, postal code, country, etc.

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the business

image.title: Image/Logo
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://) for the business's logo, preferably a square

schema.name: localloop_schema-v0.0.1
schema.purpose: A test schema to add businesses to the Murmurations Index for Local Loop
